trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="N:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> element of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento <see cref="N:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não tem construtor público.

trans-unit.source: References to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure> are obtained through the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider.AddDocumentStructure%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider.AddStoryFragment%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: As referências a um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure> são obtidos por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IDocumentStructureProvider.AddDocumentStructure%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IStoryFragmentProvider.AddStoryFragment%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> elements of an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>, see Chapter 9 in the *XPS Paper Specification (XPS)* which you can download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures> ou <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> elementos de um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>, consulte o capítulo 9 no *XPS Paper Specification (XPS)* que você pode baixar em [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761) .
